name: Pumpkin
speech: Maybe we should be nicer to them.
That must've hurt! Are you okay?
Do you need a break? It's alright!

name: Halcyon
speech: Don't start trouble. You can get out early on good behavior.
Work hard. I also work hard.
You can slack off; just don't let me catch you.

name: Paperweight
speech: Why do I have to work.
I should be sitting in an office.
My legs can't take it anymore.
My knees say it's going to rain.
I'm retiring as soon as I can.

name: Goose
speech: Paperweight sir, have you taken your meds today?
We're being too easy on them.
Some of them need to get whipped into shape.
Is there a black house here? Yes? That's amazing!
